snippet: The market was led by big technology companies like Cisco Systems, which was the biggest gainer in the sector, and energy stocks as oil rebounded.
abstract: Technology stocks help market rise back near record levels.
lead_paragraph: The market was led by big technology companies like Cisco Systems, which was the biggest gainer in the sector, and energy stocks as oil rebounded.

headline.main: Energy and Tech Stocks Push the Market Higher
headline.print_headline: Tech and Energy Shares Lead Markets Higher
